snippet.title: Outlaw Heart Gameplay First Look!
snippet.description:
After 2 years of learning how to code and make a game entirely by myself in Unreal Engine. I'm finally ready to share the first look of gameplay for Outlaw Heart! Still a lot more to do with art and level design but I think this gets the point across for now!
Outlaw Heart is a Fast Paced Character Action / Rail Shooter Playable in both Flatscreen and VR!

Music  by Undead Corporation - Chase the Rabbit
